fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Exhume (Day, 3 Uses): At the end of the night, learn what classes killed a player, or if they committed suicide. Can not be cancelled once used.
> - Triggers at the end of the night.
- Drug (Night, 3 Uses): Causes a player to falsely believe they were attacked and healed.
- Defile (Night, 2 Uses): If targeted player dies tonight, they will appear as chosen class.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Remedy Studies: Immune to bleeding.
> - Passive kept on class change.
